narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Applicant wants to be licensed as a Class C exhibitor.
Please issue a Class C license.
License fee will be submitted by mail to:
USDA, APHIS, AC, Raleigh Office
920 Main Campus Dr.
Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY MAY BE CONDUCTED UNTIL A USDA LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
